blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Honey, you're familiar (like my mirror years ago)
title: Honey, you're familiar (like my mirror years ago)
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2TGLWeV

by chaoticcollectorchaos_me

…That in a past life, he was a valiant and brilliant scientist who, with Captain America, managed to destroy HYDRA. It was a good fantasy to have for a lonely little boy growing up with everything and nothing he could have wanted.

Too bad nobody told Tony that dreams do come true.

Words: 2980, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of 26,000 days

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Howard Stark, Peggy Carter, Maria Stark, Jarvis (Iron Man movies), Edwin Jarvis, Natasha Stark
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Alternate Universe - Soulmates, Alternate Universe - Reincarnation, Pre-Iron Man 1, Slow Burn, Howard’s an okay dad, Mutant Tony Stark


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2TGLWeV

blog.name: ljb-novels
blog.title: LJB Fandom Writer
blog.description: Writing for multiple fandoms! Request for your fandom and I shall write! Requests are currently open!

title: Silly Jealous - Toad X Reader
body:
“You’ve gotta get over her!” Bobby laughed, tapping Toad on the back. Toad glanced at Scott as he sat down but his eyes quickly went back to you, across the field, with rogue and the other girls.

“You’ve been pining after her since you got here.” he laughed. Toad sighed,
“I’ve only been here 3 weeks.”
“Ask out Rogue.”
“Why?” Toad scoffed.
“Jealousy isn’t it? Ask out someone else and make them jealous.” he shrugged, “Do it, see what happens.” he smiled, dragging Toad up and into the gardens.

Rogue noticed Bobby first, and scowled at Toad next to him,
“I don’t know why you like him.” she mumbled,
“Shut up.” you quickly scolded, smiling at Toad.

He kept his eyes down, trying to build up the confidence. You thought for a moment he was actually going to do something. A smile spread across your lips as he began to speak.
“Rogue… I was wondering… If you’d like to, perhaps…” he stuttered, Rogue rolled her eyes,
“Spit out, Toad.” she scoffed,
“Go on a date with me?” he blurted. Rogue raised her eyebrows,
“No. Y/N likes you. I’m not stepping there.” she crossed her arms over her chest and smiled as your cheeks began to burn.
“She what?” Toads eyes went wide, turning to you, “You like me?”

You smiled at him, feeling yourself calm.
“Yeah. Very much so.” Toad smiled at you,
“Would you like to go on a date with me then?”
“Of course.”

blog.name: cupids-bent-arrow
blog.title: *Eats Paint Like Gogurt*
blog.description:
A scenario/imagine blog ask away ^-^ {requests: open} {headcannons:open}

Run by: Cupo

summary: Can you write some fluffy Peter B Parker material?
question: Can you write some fluffy Peter B Parker material?
answer:
Ask and you shall receive ✌︎(‘ω'✌︎ )

* okay so this MAN, oh THIS MAN!!!! He’s a bit rough around the edges but let 👏 me 👏 tell 👏 you 👏 he is g E N T LE

* he won’t ever admit to it but if he could gaze into your eyes forever,,,, he would

- he just loves your face, squishing it, kissing it, etc.

* can someone say tummy rubs 🙌

* Peter would just like laying with you on his bed and playing with your hair while watching dumb videos or just chatting

* he likes showers with you, it makes him feel close to you, more connected. Also because sometimes he’s just lazy and doesn’t wanna shower, so you have to force him in there.

* Peter love telling you all about his latest crime stopping adventure. He mayyyy have a tendency to make himself sound cooler but he loves how your eyes light up when he tells you stuff.

* You’ll have to constantly tell him to be careful and he kinda loves that.

* He’s definitely more open to you, Peter’s willing to let himself open up

* Hugs! Hugs everyw h e r e!!! He just kinda flops onto you and lazily wraps himself around you

* It’s pizza tImE

* You do try to make sure he stays active and healthy, but somehow you both end up eating pizza on the couch and gossiping

* Peter is a gossip king okay, he WILL sass and shade like no other. It’s really funny 🐸 ☕️

* Overall he just loves you so much

* 🅱️lease just help this hobo
